line.token: * Purpose: Prints out a list of radio input types
* - output (optional) - the output next to each radio button
* - assign (optional) - assign the output as an array to this variable
* - escape (optional) - escape the content (not value), defaults to true
* @author credits to Monte Ohrt <monte at ohrt dot com>
'html_radios: selected attribute is an object of class \''
'html_radios: the use of the "radios" attribute is deprecated, use "options" instead'
attribute must be a scalar, only boolean true or string '
'html_options: value is an object of class \''
'html_options: output is an object of class \''
